metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20397 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A double-free is present in libyang before v1.0-r1 in the function yyparse() when an organization field is not terminated. Applications that use libyang to parse untrusted input yang files may be vulnerable to this flaw, which would cause a crash or potentially code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20397` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyang-cpp1 - 1.0.176-1
libyang-tools - 1.0.176-1
libyang1 - 1.0.176-1
yang-tools - 1.0.176-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libyang package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.176-1').
